mapper.select:
select count(v.id) from V_YHJSSCS v where 1=1
and v.xmmc LIKE '%' || #{xmmc} || '%'
and UPPER(v.xmbh)like UPPER ('%' || #{xmbh} || '%')
and v.status =#{status}
and to_date(v.lxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_date(#{kssj},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(v.lxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= to_date(#{jssj},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and v.lxr LIKE '%' || #{lxr} || '%'
and v.xmdz LIKE '%' || #{xmdz} || '%'
and v.azlx =#{azlx}
select a.* from YS_RWCB a left join YS_RWZB b on a.ysrwzbid=b.id where a.ysfl=#{flbh} and b.xmid=#{xmid}
select a.* from YHJS_RWCB a left join YHJS_RWZB b on a.yhjsrwzbid=b.id where a.jsfl=#{flbh} and b.xmid=#{xmid}
select count(a.id) from YHJS_RW_FJ a where a.xmid=#{xmid} and a.fjlx_yj=1

select * from( select c.username as username_str,a.id,a.yhjsrwid, a.fjlx_yj,a.fjlx_ej,a.fjlj, a.fjhz, a.fjmc as fjmc_str,a.scr,a.xmid, to_char(a.scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as scsj_str_sj,a.sc_flag,a.shcr,a.shcsj,a.sfgd,a.gdr,a.gdsj ,ROWNUM rn from YHJS_RW_FJ a left join XTGL_USER c on a.scr=c.userid where a.xmid=#{xmid} and a.fjlx_yj=1 ORDER BY a.scsj DESC) WHERE rn > ${page} AND rn <= ${pageSize}
select a.* from YHJS_RWZB a where a.xmid=#{xmid}
mapper.delete: delete from YHJS_RWCB a where a.yhjsrwzbid=#{zbid}
delete from YHJS_RW_FJ a where a.yhjsrwid=#{zbid}
delete from YHJS_RW_FJ a where a.xmid=#{xmid} and a.fjlx_yj=#{fjlx}
delete from YHJS_RWZB a where a.xmid=#{xmid}
mapper.update: update YHJS_RWZB set RWBH = #{rwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XMID = #{xmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FQR = #{fqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FQRQ = #{fqrq,jdbcType=DATE}, FPR = #{fpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPSJ = #{fpsj,jdbcType=DATE}, YSRY = #{ysry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSSFTG = #{cssftg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSRY = #{csry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSSJ = #{cssj,jdbcType=DATE}, FSSFTG = #{fssftg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSRY = #{fsry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSSJ = #{fssj,jdbcType=DATE}, YHSFQR = #{yhsfqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YHQRSJ = #{yhqrsj,jdbcType=DATE}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHYJ = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.taskid,t.ptaskid,t.proc_inst_id,t.c_activityid,t.iscurrent,t.czr ,t.qssj, t.jssj,t.czsm,t.ischeck,t.check_time,t.check_memo,t.jssx,t.jssj_memo, t.check_user,t.js_user,t.check_sx,t.yssm,t.hasnew,t.slmx,t.jssx_yl,t.refkey,t.refid,t.htyy,t.thyy from WF_TASK t left join WF_RU_INST_CONTENT c on t.proc_inst_id=c.proc_inst_id where t.c_activityid='C0019' and c.contentvalue=#{xmid}
mapper.insert: insert into WF_TASK (TASKID, PTASKID, PROC_INST_ID, C_ACTIVITYID, ISCURRENT, CZR, QSSJ, JSSJ,CZSM,ISCHECK,CHECK_TIME,CHECK_MEMO, JSSX,JSSJ_MEMO,CHECK_USER,JS_USER, CHECK_SX,YSSM,HASNEW,SLMX,JSSX_YL, REFKEY,REFID,HTYY) values (#{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ptaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{proc_inst_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_activityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iscurrent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qssj,jdbcType=DATE},#{jssj,jdbcType=DATE},#{czsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ischeck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{check_time,jdbcType=DATE},#{check_memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jssx,jdbcType=DATE},#{jssj_memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{check_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{js_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{check_sx,jdbcType=DATE},#{yssm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hasnew,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{slmx,jdbcType=CLOB},#{jssx_yl,jdbcType=DATE}, #{refkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{refid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{htyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into WF_TASK_HISTORY (TASKID, PTASKID, PROC_INST_ID, C_ACTIVITYID, ISCURRENT, CZR, QSSJ, JSSJ,CZSM,ISCHECK,CHECK_TIME,CHECK_MEMO, JSSX,JSSJ_MEMO,CHECK_USER,JS_USER, CHECK_SX,YSSM,HASNEW,SLMX,JSSX_YL, REFKEY,REFID,HTYY) values (#{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ptaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{proc_inst_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_activityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iscurrent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qssj,jdbcType=DATE},#{jssj,jdbcType=DATE},#{czsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ischeck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{check_time,jdbcType=DATE},#{check_memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jssx,jdbcType=DATE},#{jssj_memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{check_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{js_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{check_sx,jdbcType=DATE},#{yssm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hasnew,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{slmx,jdbcType=CLOB},#{jssx_yl,jdbcType=DATE}, #{refkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{refid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{htyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select a.id,a.yhjsrwid, a.fjlx_yj,a.fjlx_ej,a.fjlj, a.fjhz, a.fjmc,a.scr,a.xmid, a.sc_flag,a.shcr,a.shcsj,a.sfgd,a.gdr,a.gdsj from YHJS_RW_FJ a where a.xmid=#{xmid} and a.fjlx_yj=1
